XPathFactoryConfigurationException(java..Description: Constructs a new XPathFactoryConfigurationException with the specified cause. If cause is null, then a NullPointerException is thrown.
Constructs a new XPathFactoryConfigurationException with the specified detail message. The cause is not initialized. If message is null, then a NullPointerException is thrown.

ClassDesc: XPathFactoryConfigurationException represents a configuration error in a XPathFactory environment.
